Fabrizio Goglia
projects about

  • Ships Aquarium

    Interactive visualization with Processing to check real-time data about ships in Venice.

  • Venice Forward Future

    Series of controlled tests run within the prestigious Muranese furnace Salviati.

  • Manifesto per la Cultura

    Il Manifesto per la Cultura is an infographic, designed on an article of the economist Giovanna Segre for Il Sole 24 Ore.

  • Pioneer Plaque

    Information Design Poster about an image sent to space, aims to give a message about us to other inhabitants of the universe.
